data.description:
*NEW UPDATE!* Endless Mode - Play forever! Serve to compete on the leaderboards or chill out and go at your own pace. 

Abducted by accident and enrolled into the Startenders Bartending Academy, you will have to shake, slice and serve to survive until you can find a way to escape!

Use your skills to create delicious concoctions to serve to your alien patrons, use wacky machines and even wackier ingredients to earn your way home.    

Startenders Features:  
● Fully voice acted story to progress through
● Create and serve crazy drinks to aliens!
● Unlock new machines to build, and strange ingredients to create your drinks
● Visit colourful locations across the galaxy or hang out in the habitat
● Make and name your own custom drinks for customers to buy
● Compete on the intergalactic leaderboards in Daily Play
● Never ending mixology in Endless Mode

changelog.change_log:
Release 2.0.5820_51e121a36
Progression Changes - 
Special ingredients are now given to you on completing certain shifts. This is awarded to you with a brief explanation of how the ingredient can be used. (If you haven’t purchased these in the store before this update you will auto unlock the items you would have with the new progression changes)

Players are still able to buy ingredient variants in the store, fruits, sodas, bartaps and canisters.

New Music Tracks - 
Two new music tracks added to the bar and habitat

Bar Tap Snap Zones - 
Placing cups under the bar taps will now socket them. This means you do not have to accurately position the cup under the tap. Increasing player flow.

Fluidizer Mk1 Snap Zones - 
Placing cups under the fluidizer Mk1 will now socket them. This means you do not have to accurately position the cup under the tap. Increasing player flow.

Objects falling through bar - 
Extra colliders have been added to the bar which should help stop small items falling through the bar sometimes.

Workshop Fix - 
The workshop will now close when you leave it, this was causing a bug where it wouldn’t update new blueprint purchases if you had previously been to the workshop.

If you find any bugs or have suggestions feel free to reach out to contact@foggybox.co.uk or join our discord via Joinstartenders.com

Hotfix
Beteljuice fix to ensure correct unlock

[Hotfix]
Fixed Startenders not starting if device has no internet connection
Increased tracked grabbables to mitigate "Infinite Fountain Spawning" on grabbables.

ADDED
Hands 2.0
Endless Mode
Timers On - Allows you to put your drinks served on a persistent global leaderboard
Timers Off - Laid back and casual endless mode

Star Tokens
Star tokens will be awarded to you when serving a perfect 100% accurate drink. These can be earned in Campaign or Endless Modes

Lucky Stars Machine
Spend your tokens on the chance to unlock cosmetics

Cosmetics
Equip RILEE with hats
Cap
Cat Ears
Copter Hat
Adventurer Hat
Disguise
Dunce Cap
Alien Eyes
Frosted Tips
Mohawk
Party Hat
Sombrero
Top Hat
Tricorn
Woolly Hat
Witch Hat
Pumpkin Hat

Place bobbleheads on your Barship bar
Aquasian
Granitian
Grondian
Mantoid
Siimalon
Academy
RILEE
Barship
Tim

Give yourself some new Startender gloves
Robot Hands + variants 
Crab Claws + variants 
Wolvian Hands + variants 
Astronaut Gloves + variants 
Washing up gloves + variants 
Grondian Claws + variants 
Startender Gloves + variants 

New Secret Ingredient

Mk2 Decontaminated Cup Return
Mk3 Decontaminated Cup Return

Unbreakable Glasses Upgrade

MK3 Fluidiser will now display the icon of the item that is fluidised

Noot Alien will now display the action command when it is ready to be squeezed

Ingredients in shop will now show a brief description of the actions needed to use the item in shifts, also clearer if purchased

Token and Kredit VFX on served drinks

New Music Track

CHANGES 
Settings - 
New Settings Layout
Rotate on Teleport - Turn on/off auto rotation on teleporting
RILEE VO - turn on/off RILEE’s idle VO
Snap Turning modes - Switch between snap turning rotation via the head position or the Playspace origin (This should help seated players maintain their position in the bar)

Impressing customers fully will give a bigger boost to waiting time.
Barship UI Changes
HUB Overhaul
Shop Overhaul
Barship machine selector
Customers can dance whilst waiting for drinks
Machines built achievement now requires MK2/3 Contaminated Return machines
Tweaked tutorial lines to try and better explain impressions and timers of customers
Ion Grease will now reset after 10 seconds if not grabbed once used.
Free Mix Overhaul
More Freemix slots (99)
Shift 13 replaced with infinity symbol to help represent infinite shifts
Pricing on Blueprints and Machines
Bottle caps left on floor will auto destroy after 20 seconds
Buttons and Scrolling entirely re-done and more accurate
Dorts Overhaul
Customers' walk speed has increased
Layout changes for customers in Ninsiima Outpost

FIXES
Door SFX
Dorts lag fixes
Drink accuracy calculation
Drink reward calculation
Throttle HFX/SFX
Difficulty choice selector bug
Garnishes are now locked when trying to remove the shaker
Total Kredits Earned - Now actually tracked
Total Kredits Spent - Now actually tracked
Total Drinks Served - Now correctly tracked
Finoleum can now be put back in the Quantum Cupboard
Sparkler SFX not stopping on destroy
Anti Matter/ Anti Anti Matter SFX not stopping on destroy
Quantum Mass SFX not stopping on destroy
Soft Particles being invisible sometimes
Subtitles break when disabled in settings when active in scene
Some Items not correctly spawning in the delivery crates
Spraying MK3 guns upwards and depleting them causes null reference error

Release 2.0.5702_da02f2cc8

Release 1.5.5253_7db041191
Fixes custom drinks not being accepted

Release 1.5.5193_5ce301f12
Hotfix 4 - 
Canister opener will stop spawning underneath the counter if you have raised the height before entering a bar.

Release 1.4.5176_e7a031fe9
Hot Fix 3 -
Added
Analytics

Changes
Shift balancing - Progression Ramp should be much nicer for newer players
Loading Bar flipped - Because it looks better

Fixes
Canister Breaching Unit now resets when lost
Sockets are now more reactive to fast paced players
Garnishes easier to put on and remove

Release 1.4.4762_07a906671

Startenders Minor Update 2
Fixed - Thumbs up icon not appearing in tutorial when in hands mode
Fixed - Fluidiser Mk3 guns not longer appear in the middle of the room when not active
Fixed - Decontaminator MK3 hides socketed cups when not active
Added - Easy Reach - The player can toggle "Easy Reach" to reach less for far away objects (Replacing seated mode toggle)
Added - Height offset - Can now adjust "height offset" to increase or decrease camera height (Replacing seated mode toggle)
Changed - Short mode toggle - Removed and split into 2 options
Changed - Infuser MK3 should now be less prone to accidental button hits
Changed - Thermo Canisters for Infuser will now auto destroy and respawn after 5 seconds

Release 1.4.4742_708a2afd6

Startenders (Minor Update 1)
- Fixed inaccesible weld points on certain Blueprints in the Workshop
- Fixed FPS drop on Quest 1 when looking at certain visual effects
- Fixed Rocket Fuel bottle cap being hard to grab
- Fixed some visual artifacts on containers in the Bar Ship
- Fixed an issue with the Consider Me Impressed Achievement
- Fixed waiting customers not performing talk animation when playing voice lines
- Fixed some haptics being so strong they visibly vibrate objects in game
- Fixed Infuser allowing to infuse with no glass
- Fixed no music during credits
- Updated several translations causing incorrect voice lines

Release 1.3.4698_3177d8086

Startenders Minor Update 2
Fixed - Thumbs up icon not appearing in tutorial when in hands mode
Fixed - Fluidiser Mk3 guns not longer appear in the middle of the room when not active
Fixed - Decontaminator MK3 hides socketed cups when not active
Added - Easy Reach - The player can toggle "Easy Reach" to reach less for far away objects (Replacing seated mode toggle)
Added - Height offset - Can now adjust "height offset" to increase or decrease camera height (Replacing seated mode toggle)
Changed - Short mode toggle - Removed and split into 2 options
Changed - Infuser MK3 should now be less prone to accidental button hits
Changed - Thermo Canisters for Infuser will now auto destroy and respawn after 5 seconds
